mapper.insert: insert into artist (anum, artist, userid) values (seq_artist.nextval, #{artist}, #{userid})
mapper.select: select artist from artist where upper(artist) like upper(#{input})||'%' order by artist
mapper.delete: delete from game_artist where gnum = #{gnum} and anum = (select anum from artist where artist=#{artist})
mapper.select: SELECT anum, artist from ( select anum, artist from artist where UPPER(artist) like '%' || UPPER(#{gameKeyword}) || '%' order by CASE WHEN UPPER(artist) like UPPER(#{gameKeyword}) || '%' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END ) where rownum between 1 and 12
